products.name: Queen Storage Bed
products.shortDescription: Platform bed with 9 storage drawers. Design maximizes storage space below mattress while maintaining a rigid structure.
fullDescription: This platform bed design maximizes storage space with 9 integrated drawers while maintaining structural rigidity for long-term use.
Built from standard plywood sheets with 3D printed drawer hardware for smooth operation. The modular design allows for customization of drawer sizes and configurations.
